alert.note: Alert for Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln County through 330 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Star Valley Rest Area, which is also over Thayne, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Thayne around 310 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Star Valley Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
